description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Veg Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheesy Veg Bake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill to high. Roughly mash cooked vegetables together and stir in a little milk to make smooth (the smoothness will depend on the age of your toddler). Spoon a serving portion into a small ovenproof dish. Combine breadcrumbs and grated cheese. Sprinkle over mash. Grill for 5 minutes or until golden.

Preheat grill to high. Roughly mash cooked vegetables together and stir in a little milk to make smooth (the smoothness will depend on the age of your toddler). Spoon a serving portion into a small ovenproof dish. Combine breadcrumbs and grated cheese. Sprinkle over mash. Grill for 5 minutes or until golden.
